attributes.action: For the Government to conduct themselves appropriately in the House of Commons
attributes.additional_details: MP's are supposed to represent us in a professional manner, Jeering, laughing at and nothing short of bullying in the House should be stopped as this does nothing for the debate, if this was done in a normal work environment many would be fired or given warnings.
attributes.background: PMQ's have become nothing short of MP's laughing at and bullying each other should conduct themselves more appropriately to their positions as heads of state
